returns.subtitle: What should happen to your original documents?
returns.title: Document fate

items.3: Required documents will be sent to you on request for a fee

items.1: Your plan does not include a regular return. This simply means: You select the originals you want and order them.
items.2: Book a regular return and receive all original documents in the cycle selected.

optional.title: So kommt Ihre Post automatisch zu CAYA

1.highlighted: Please never try to set up a postal forwarding order yourself!
1.regular:
We are happy to set up the forwarding order for you at dpag's list price and renew it annually as long as you are our customer. 

Ordinary letter mail, as well as registered mail and letter goods are forwarded via forwarding service. Parcels, registered mail, newspapers and magazines will continue to be delivered to your address.

items.2: Important: Place your forwarding order in the same way as your daily mail is addressed to you. Only one private household or company is allowed per order. You can post further forwarding orders later in the CAYA settings. If you as a private customer have several names, please enter the names separated by commas in the name field.

items.1: Once a forwarding order has been set up, it can no longer be customized. If you have any doubts, just give us a call!

addressForm.title: Your postal forwarding order to us

name.business: Company name (as on letters addressed to you)
name.private: First & Last Name (As found on letters addressed to you)

fields.street: Street & house number (please separate with spaces)

optional.title: This is how your postal mail gets to us
optional.description: Please do not try to set up a forwarding order yourself! We have special processes with the Deutsche Post AG. We will set up the forwarding order for you correctly and extend it as long as you are a customer with us.

warning.title: You can set up additional forwarding orders in your settings at any later time.
